markers.title: Cafe Coho
markers.content: Trendy coffee shop with bare bricks and reclaimed furniture, for breakfast, savoury snacks and cake.

markers.title: Coffee33
markers.content: An under-stated coffee shop filled by a wooden bar. Serves coffee, cake, snacks, and sandwiches.

markers.title: Small Batch Coffee Company
markers.content: Indie coffee roaster's popular flagship cafe with full-length windows.

markers.title: Marwood Coffeehouse
markers.content: Coffee, cake and a simple menu, surrounded by books, toys, 1980s relics and crazy bric-a-brac.

markers.title: Silo
markers.content: Airy, wood and steel-furnished, eco-chic restaurant serving menu made from locally sourced produce.
